CustomField.description: Defines whether each phone conversation was positive, neutral, or negative
CustomField.formula: IF( CallDisposition = 'Meeting set' || CallDisposition = 'Interested' || CallDisposition = 'Demo scheduled' ,'Positive signal', IF(CallDisposition = 'Not interested' || CallDisposition = 'Bad fit' || CallDisposition = 'With competitor' || CallDisposition = 'Hung up' || CallDisposition = 'No longer with company', 'Negative signal', IF (CallDisposition = 'Referred to another person' || CallDisposition = 'Set callback' || CallDisposition = 'Not a direct line' || CallDisposition = 'potential future opportunity', 'Neutral signal', null )))
CustomField.label: Conversation Signal
